english.segment1: i would give everything. to give nothing more. i would give everything. to give nothing more
english.segment2: walk outside you're standing in the rain. eyes collide we both know i'm to blame. see me cry feel like judas for awhile. absolution i'm feeling so tired
english.segment3: bygones by you took away the blame. this humanity haunts me. everyday i feel ashamed
english.segment4: how long till everything is new. how long till our bodies are renewed. how long till we see you face to face. how long till we reach that perfect place
